pages.text: Steam is a chemical that has a few different uses. You can obtain Steam from boiling water in a $(l:multiblocks/boiler)Thermoelectric Boiler$(/l).$(p)One of the uses of Steam is using it to hydrate some blocks/items (such as corals) in a $(l:machines/chemical_injection_chamber)Chemical Injection Chamber$(/l).
Another use of Steam is in an $(l:multiblocks/tubrine)Industrial Turbine$(/l) if you have Mekanism: Generators installed. This is used to produce power and a fairly dececnt rate.
